REST API routes Passwords¶

src.auth.pass_utils.get_password_hash(password)[source]¶

Hash user password :type password: str :param password: User password in hashed view. :type password: str :return: Hashed password :rtype: str

src.auth.pass_utils.verify_password(plain_password, password_hashed)[source]¶

Verify if user enters password the same as its hashed version in db :type plain_password: str :param plain_password: User password. :type plain_password: str :type password_hashed: str :param password_hashed: Hashed user password :type password_hashed: str :return: If password is valid :rtype: bool
